mapper.select: SELECT mti.id,po.company_s_name,po.platform_service_provider,mti.maker_tax_url,mti.maker_invoice_url,mti.total_amount,po.payment_date, po.payment_order_status,mti.invoice_date,po.id as pid,po.payment_inventory,po.turnkey_project_payment,po.acceptance_certificate, po.subpackage_payment,t.task_code,t.task_name FROM tb_maker_total_invoice as mti INNER JOIN tb_application_payment as ap ON ap.payment_order_id INNER JOIN tb_invoice_application as ia ON ia.id= ap.invoice_application_id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order as po ON po.id=ap.payment_order_id INNER JOIN tb_invoice as i ON ia.id=i.application_id LEFT JOIN tb_task as t ON t.id=po.id WHERE po.is_subpackage=1 and mti.id=#{invoiceId}

SELECT pi.worker_id,pi.worker_name,pi.mobile_code,pi.id_card_code,pi.bank_code,pi.real_money FROM tb_maker_total_invoice as mti INNER JOIN tb_invoice_list il ON il.maker_total_invoice_id=mti.id INNER JOIN tb_invoice i ON i.id=il.invoice_id INNER JOIN tb_invoice_application AS ia ON ia.id = i.application_id INNER JOIN tb_application_payment AS ap ON ap.invoice_application_id = ia.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order AS po ON po.id = ap.payment_order_id INNER JOIN tb_payment_inventory AS pi ON pi.payment_order_id = po.id WHERE mti.id=#{invoiceId}

SELECT po.id, po.company_s_name, po.platform_service_provider, po.acceptance_certificate, po.payment_order_status, po.payment_inventory, po.payment_date, po.subpackage_payment, t.task_code, t.task_name FROM tb_maker_total_invoice mti INNER JOIN tb_invoice_list il ON il.maker_total_invoice_id = mti.id INNER JOIN tb_invoice i ON i.id = il.invoice_id INNER JOIN tb_invoice_application ia ON ia.id = i.application_id INNER JOIN tb_application_payment ap ON ap.invoice_application_id = ia.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order po ON po.id = ap.payment_order_id LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id = po.task_id where mti.id=#{invoiceId}
